Platform.Name: XForms
Platform.CommonDescription: Note: This package needs to be installed in all Xamarin.Forms projects (PCL, Android, iOS and UWP).

Project.Name: SfChart
Project.Description: Essential Chart for Xamarin.Forms is a feature rich, highly customizable and presentable business Chart control. It is intended for developers looking to add advanced, feature rich, visually appealing charts to the cross-platform mobile applications.

Project.Name: SfGauge
Project.Description: Essential Gauge for Xamarin.Forms is ideal to visualize numeric values. The appearance of the gauge can be fully customized to seamlessly integrate with your applications.

Project.Name: SfTreeMap
Project.Description: Essential Treemap for Xamarin.Forms provides a simple yet effective way to visualize flat or hierarchical data as clustered rectangles, with a specific weighted attribute determining the size of the rectangle.

Project.Name: SfBarcode
Project.Description: Essential Barcode for Xamarin.Froms helps rendering bar codes in effective way and it encodes the text using supported one dimensional and two dimensional symbologies.

Project.Name: SfBusyIndicator
Project.Description: Essential BusyIndicator for Xamarin.Froms is includes over 13 built-in animations that can be displayed within your applications.

Project.Name: SfRangeSlider
Project.Description: Essential RangeSlider for Xamarin.Froms is allows you to select the range of value within the specified minimum and maximum limits.

Project.Name: SfAutoComplete
Project.Description: Essential AutoComplete for providing suggestions to user while typing.

Project.Name: SfDataGrid
Project.Description: Essential DataGrid for Xamarin.Forms is a high performance grid component that helps you to create entirely customizable features used to display and manipulate the huge amount of data in a tabular view. It is intended for developers looking to use advanced DataGrid in the cross-platform mobile applications.

Project.Name: SfGridConverter
Project.Description: Syncfusion SfGridConverter is a .Net library for exporting the SfDataGrid to excel and pdf formats.

Project.Name: SfSchedule
Project.Description: Essential Schedule control is used to schedule and manage appointments with intuitive user interface similar to native calendar. Its rich feature set includes functionalities like Navigation and Date Restrictions.

Project.Name: SfCalendar
Project.Description: Essential Calendar widget provides the multi-view representation to display and select one or more dates within specified ranges. Also provides a gesture friendly UI to perform operations like navigations, events, etc.

Project.Name: SfRating
Project.Description: Essential Rating control has a group of stars to indicate the rating with flexible precision. Also provides various customization support on item size, item spacing and the number of displayed items.

Project.Name: SfCarousel
Project.Description: Essential Carousel control is a user interface providing rich visual navigation experience of image data. Also provides efficient customization of items and interactive navigation features.

Project.Name: SfMaps
Project.Description: Essential Maps control is a data visualization control to visualize statistical data of geographical area on globe as map.

Project.Name: SfNumericUpDown
Project.Description: Essential NumericUpDown is an editor control which provides up and down repeat buttons to increment and decrement the values. The control respects the UI culture and can be configured to display different formats like currency format, scientific format, etc.

Project.Name: SfRotator
Project.Description: Essential Rotator control allows you to populate images and display them. These images can be navigated through Swiping, AutoPlay and NavigationBar.

Project.Name: SfRadialMenu
Project.Description: SfRadialMenu displays a hierarchical menu in circular layout optimized for touch devices. It can expose more menu items in the same space than traditional menus.

Project.Name: Calculate
Project.Description: The Essential Calculate for Xamarin.Portable allows you to add extensive calculation support to your business objects

Project.Name: SfPullToRefresh
Project.Description: SfPullToRefresh is a pullable panel which on pulling down the main content in order to refresh the data in the application application.

Project.Name: SfTabControl
Project.Description: NuGet package of Syncfusion.Xamarin.SfTabControl assembly

Project.Name: SfNavigationDrawer
Project.Description: The NavigationDrawer is a sliding panel menu that comes out from the edge of the window and allows to have the contents in a hidden panel.

Project.Name: Compression
Project.Description: NuGet package of Syncfusion.Xamarin.Compression assembly.

Project.Name: OfficeChart
Project.Description: Essential OfficeChart Provides support to create and manipulate charts.

Project.Name: Presentation
Project.Description: Essential Presentation is a .NET class library that can read, write, modify and render Microsoft PowerPoint files (*.pptx only). It features a full-fledged object model to represent presentations, slides and its contents.

Project.Name: DocIO
Project.Description: Essential DocIO is a .Net library for creating and manipulating Word documents without using Microsoft Office.

Project.Name: Pdf
Project.Description: Essential PDF is a .Net library for creating and manipulating PDF documents without using Adobe Acrobat.

Project.Name: XlsIO
Project.Description: Essential XlsIO is a .Net library for creating and manipulating Excel documents without using Microsoft Office.

Project.Name: DataSource
Project.Description: Syncfusion.DataSource.Portable is a .Net library that consumes raw data and processes data operations such as sorting, filtering and grouping saving developers’ time and efforts in building the functionality themselves.

Project.Name: SfPdfViewer
Project.Description: Essential PDF Viewer for Xamarin.Forms is a control with the ability of display PDF documents with options to zoom and navigate among the pages.

Project.Name: SfKanban
Project.Description: The Essential Kanban control for Xamarin.Forms is an efficient control to visualize the workflow at each stage along its path to completion.

Project.Name: SfSparkline
Project.Description: A sparkline is a very small chart, typically drawn without axes or coordinates. It presents the general shape of data’s in a simple and highly condensed way.

Project.Name: SfListView
Project.Description: Essential SfListView for Xamarin.Forms is presenting a set of data items in different layouts or views. It can be used to easily visualize your items in groups,sorted and filtered in accordance with your criteria.

Project.Name: SfSunburstChart
Project.Description: Essential SfSunburstchart for Xamarin.Forms provides a simple yet effective way to visualise flat or hierarchical data as clustered circles. The center circle represents the root level in the hierarchy, with outer circles representing the higher levels of the hierarchy.

Project.Name: SfImageEditor
Project.Description: SfImageEditor control allows user to view and perform simple manipulations on images like inverting the pixels in an image, transforming an image, annotate on image for detailed view,rotating an image drawing on an image etc.

Project.Name: SfDiagram
Project.Description: The Diagram control is used for creating diagrams like flow charts, organizational charts and Directed Tree Charts either through code or through a visual interface that is like Visio.

Project.Name: SfPicker
Project.Description: A SfPicker control allows user to pick an item among a list of Items that can be customize or template with custom view. This control can also open as dialog.

Platform.Name: Android
Platform.CommonDescription: Note: This package is intended to be installed in native Xamarin.Android projects only.

Project.Name: SfChart
Project.Description: Essential Chart for Xamarin.Android is a feature rich, highly customizable and presentable business Chart control.It is intended for developers looking to add charts to the cross-platform mobile applications.

Project.Name: SfGauge
Project.Description: Essential Gauge for Xamarin.Android is ideal to visualize numeric values. The appearance of the gauge can be fully customized to seamlessly integrate with your applications.

Project.Name: SfTreeMap
Project.Description: Essential Treemap for Xamarin.Android provides a simple yet effective way to visualize flat or hierarchical data as clustered rectangles, with a specific weighted attribute determining the size of the rectangle.

Project.Name: SfBarcode
Project.Description: Essential Barcode for Xamarin.Android helps rendering bar codes in effective way and it encodes the text using supported one dimensional and two dimensional symbologies.

Project.Name: SfBusyIndicator
Project.Description: Essential BusyIndicator for Xamarin.Android is includes over 13 built-in animations that can be displayed within your applications.

Project.Name: SfRangeSlider
Project.Description: Essential RangeSlider for Xamarin.Android is allows you to select the range of value within the specified minimum and maximum limits.

Project.Name: SfDataGrid
Project.Description: Essential DataGrid for Xamarin.Android is a high performance grid component that helps you to create entirely customizable features used to display and manipulate the huge amount of data in a tabular view. It is intended for developers looking to use advanced DataGrid in the iOS mobile applications.

Project.Name: SfDataForm
Project.Description: The SfDataForm control helps to develop various forms such as login, reservation and data entry, etc. The control displays properties in list or grid layout with convenient editors based on its type.

Project.Name: SfDiagram
Project.Description: The Diagram control is used for creating diagrams like flow charts, organizational charts and Directed Tree Charts either through code or through a visual interface that is like Visio.

Project.Name: SfAutoComplete
Project.Description: Essential AutoComplete for providing suggestions to user while typing.

Project.Name: SfNumericTextBox
Project.Description: Essential NumericTextBox is an advanced version of the Entry control, which restricts input to numeric values.

Project.Name: SfNavigationDrawer
Project.Description: The Essential NavigationDrawer is a sliding panel menu that comes out from the edge of the window and allows to have the contents in a hidden panel. It can be shown by swiping from any of the four screen edges or by demand.

Project.Name: SfMaps
Project.Description: Essential Maps control is a data visualization control to visualize statistical data of geographical area on globe as map.

Project.Name: SfGridConverter
Project.Description: NuGet package of Syncfusion SfGridConverter.

Project.Description: Essential Calendar widget provides the multi-view representation to display and select one or more dates within specified ranges. Also provides a gesture friendly UI to perform operations like navigations, events, etc.

Project.Description: Essential Rotator control allows you to populate images and display them. These images can be navigated through Swiping, AutoPlay and NavigationBar.

Project.Name: SfPullToRefresh
Project.Description: SfPullToRefresh is a pullable panel which on pulling down the main content in order to refresh the data in the application application.

Project.Name: Calculate
Project.Description: The Essential Calculate for Xamarin.Portable allows you to add extensive calculation support to your business objects.

Project.Name: SfKanban
Project.Description: The Essential Kanban control for Xamarin.Android is an efficient control to visualize the workflow at each stage along its path to completion.

Project.Name: SfRadialMenu
Project.Description: The SfRadialMenu displays a hierarchical menu in a circular layout optimized for touch devices. It can expose more menu items in the same space than traditional menus.

Project.Name: SfSparkline
Project.Description: A sparkline is a very small chart, typically drawn without axes or coordinates. It presents the general shape of data’s in a simple and highly condensed way.

Project.Name: SfPdfViewer
Project.Description: Essential PDF Viewer for Xamarin Android is a control with the ability of display PDF documents with options to zoom and navigate among the pages.

Project.Name: SfSunburstChart
Project.Description: Essential SfSunburstchart for Xamarin.Android provides a simple yet effective way to visualise flat or hierarchical data as clustered circles. The center circle represents the root level in the hierarchy, with outer circles representing the higher levels of the hierarchy.

Project.Name: SfImageEditor
Project.Description: SfImageEditor control allows user to view and perform simple manipulations on images like inverting the pixels in an image, transforming an image, annotate on image for detailed view,rotating an image drawing on an image etc.

Project.Name: SfPicker
Project.Description: A SfPicker control allows user to pick an item among a list of Items that can be customize or template with custom view. This control can also open as dialog.
